org.anarres.qemu.exec.vm.device

Interface QEmuDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QEmuOption
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QEmuVgaDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QEmuVgaDevice.CirrusPci

    public interface QEmuDevice
extends QEmuOption
    A QEmuDevice is a device frontend visible to the VM on a bus. Many devices are paired with device backends expressed via QEmuDriveOption, QEmuNetdevOption, QEmuDisplayOption, etc. This interface is a convenience for documentation and may go away or be replaced.
    See Also:
    QEmuDeviceOption

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.anarres.qemu.exec.QEmuOption

        QEmuOption.Container

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.anarres.qemu.exec.QEmuOption

        appendTo
